input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
No description available.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Brand Men's Cloud Reversible Crew'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Performance Long-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Slub Varsity Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Cloud Cotton Long-Sleeve Baseball Tee - Navy'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Cabana Towel Terry Crewneck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Pima Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Pima Cotton Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Women's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Essential Organic Cotton Crew Tee'
  - Name='Bombas Women's V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Alternative Apparel Men's T-Shirt'
  - Name='Alternative Apparel Men's Eco Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Alternative Apparel Men's Eco Shirttail Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's '73 Skyline Pocket Responsibili-Tee'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch The Organic Cotton Tee'
  - Name='MARINE LAYER Relaxed Hemp Cotton Tee'
  - Name='Outerknown Men's Sojourn T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Flying Fish Tides Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Tee'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a men's short-sleeve t-shirt likely made from comfortable materials, similar in purpose to an organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's tee with a casual style but may have different fabric or construction influences; still a close category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Brand Men's Cloud Reversible Crew
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck t-shirt but reversible design adds a different feature; still a similar core product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Performance Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and performance fabric change the silhouette and function somewhat, but still a t-shirt variant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve, cotton material with eco-conscious focus and V-neck, very close in style and fabric to an organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Slub Varsity Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's tee with a distinctive style (varsity), possibly different cut and fit; some relevance as casual cotton t-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Cloud Cotton Long-Sleeve Baseball Tee - Navy
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve baseball tee differs in sleeve length and silhouette but still cotton based t-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Cabana Towel Terry Crewneck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crewneck t-shirt but terry fabric differs from standard cotton tee, changing texture and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Pima Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pima cotton short-sleeve t-shirt with similar function and fabric quality as organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Women's Pima Cotton Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cut implies different silhouette but pima cotton crew neck tee is similar in material and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's pima cotton tee with pocket; pocket adds slight styling difference but core product is very similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's slim fit t-shirt; similar fabric but different cut and audience impact relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bombas Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cotton V-neck tee closely related but neckline differs from crew or standard neckline.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's slim fit cotton crew neck tee similar in fabric and style with a more tailored fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's The Essential Organic Cotton Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same type of product: men's organic cotton crew neck tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Women's V-Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's V-neck cotton tee; differs in fit and neckline from a presumably crew neck men's tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alternative Apparel Men's T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's t-shirt likely cotton; general competitor in same category though brand specifics might differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alternative Apparel Men's Eco Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's eco-friendly cotton crew neck tee closely matches organic cotton shop tee in material and form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alternative Apparel Men's Eco Shirttail Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Menâ€™s eco cotton tee with shirttail hem detail; core product is the same but silhouette varies slightly.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-friendly tee with pocket; likely organic or recycled cotton; pocket detail influences style but similar core product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch The Organic Cotton Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product name and brand; exact match to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MARINE LAYER Relaxed Hemp Cotton Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed hemp/cotton blend tee similar in silhouette and eco-friendly fabric emphasis, slightly different material.
